explanation: The bug in the program is that when counting 'T' and 'A', the program incorrectly includes the check of whether T or A has reached N/2 + 1 when printing the result. This check should happen only after the final character is processed (which is why it should be outside the loop). I moved the condition checks outside of the loop that processes each character of S. Specifically, I replaced the line 'if(A>=(N/2+1)):' to be after the loop block, only doing the comparison when done reading S.
